New Records: The Diamondbacks are undefeated at home in the postseason, winning all three games at Chase Field.
Key Match Events: The Diamondbacks scored three runs in the eighth inning off Craig Kimbrel to tie the series in Game 4.
Pre-Game Insights: The series is tied 2-2, with the home team winning every game so far. The Diamondbacks have a home field advantage, while the Phillies are facing a must-win situation on the road.
Post-Match Reflections: The Diamondbacks' eighth-inning rally in Game 4 was a significant turning point, showcasing their resilience and bullpen strength.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Game 5 will feature Zack Wheeler for the Phillies and Zac Gallen for the Diamondbacks, both of whom had strong performances in their previous meeting.
Others: The NLCS has been a series of home wins, highlighting the importance of playing in front of a supportive home crowd.
